title: Aicte
content: Is ec campus not aicte approved or what is going on here?

comments.body: Private universities even tho can get AICTE approval they aren't necessarily required to, so since EC is also its own university it doesn't have to maintain an AICTE approval
I was told that aicte approved is something you can look to to find reputable colleges. Since it comes under pes university, is ec also considered aicte approved by this ? I donâ€™t get it
